markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Treacherous Earth](/Feats.aspx?ID=2571) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once every 10 minutes

</column>

---

You have the power to shatter the earth into a shape of your devising. You crack the ground beneath you, creating difficult terrain in a 5-foot burst centered on one corner of your space.
name: Treacherous Earth
